game.name: Nikhad Islands
game.shortDescription: A Simple Adventure Arcade Clicker Game, you are a Squirrel that needs to beat all the enemies on three Islands in the shortest possible time while you Stun, Dash and Click to kill your enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Simple Adventure Arcade Clicker Game, you are a Squirrel that needs to beat all the enemies on three Islands in the shortest possible time while you Stun, Dash and Click to kill your enemies.
